sections.changelog:
Added

  • Effective Hierarchy system: support for skipped hierarchy levels in field_mapping (e.g., Brand → Model without Type)
  • Generic N-level tree parser (`parse_mapped()`) replacing hardcoded 3-level structure
  • Universal `get_hierarchy_level()`, `get_prices()`, `get_all_prices()` AJAX handlers for any hierarchy depth
  • `data-effective-levels` attribute for frontend JS cascade navigation
  • Auto-skip for single-variant hierarchy levels (auto-select and advance to next level)
  • JS helper functions: `getNextEffectiveLevel()`, `getParentEffectiveLevels()`, `getSubsequentEffectiveLevels()`, etc.

Changed

  • Field mapper now allows gaps in hierarchy levels (no sequential validation)
  • Statistics logging maps effective levels to brand/type/model columns

Fixed

  • CSRF vulnerability in migration notice dismissal (added nonce check)
  • Potential fatal error when `mvweb_sanitize_array()` not available (added fallback)
  • Debug `error_log()` left in production code (removed)
  • CHANGELOG title incorrect ("Price Calculator" → "Price Table")
  • `package.json` version not synced with plugin version
  • Input type validation (`is_string()`) for AJAX request parameters
  • JSON decode error handling for field_mapping
  • Recursion depth guard in `collect_tree_services()` (max 10 levels)
  • Debug parameter sanitization in Price Resolver
